name: Bemelmans Barter
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces V.S. Cognac, like Courvoisier V.S. or Hennessy V.S

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing glass, combine the Cognac, Curaçao, pineapple juice and Angostura bitters. Add ice and mix well.
Strain drink into a chilled cocktail glass. Lightly dust with nutmeg. Holding the orange twist with tongs, touch a flame to it so the oil in the skin briefly lights. Add to glass and serve.
